name: Teeth Whitening
desc: The practice involves swishing oil around in your mouth to remove bacteria, which can turn into plaque and cause your teeth to look yellow.

name: Cosmetic Dentistry
desc: Cosmetic dentistry mainly concerns improving the appearance of your teeth, including whitening & cleaning.

name: Pediatric Dentistry
desc: Pediatric dentists are responsible for taking care of your children. Many children require treatment by an orthodontist, a doctor specially trained in braces.

name: Preventive Dentistry
desc: Preventive dentistry is the practice of caring for your teeth to keep them healthy. This helps to avoid cavities, gum disease, enamel wear, and more.

name: Dental Crowns
desc: The crown restores the tooth to its normal shape, size, and function. A crown can make the tooth stronger or improve the way it looks.

name: Dental Implants
desc: our caregivers enable clients to maintain their normal daily routines. Hourly home care allows clients to use our caregivers on an hourly or as-needed basis.
